directions: Combine tomatoes, cilantro, scallions, garlic, red wine vinegar, chile-garlic sauce, olive oil, and garlic salt in a food processor or blender; process to the desired consistency. Refrigerate for 2 hours to let the flavors blend.
ingredients: 1 bunch fresh cilantro (leaves and stems), chopped
2 tablespoons chile-garlic sauce (such as Huy Fong Foods®)
title: Chilean Pebre Sauce
